title: Bando sulla Memoria Europea - Cervitalia
abstract: Il bando sulla Memoria Europea mira a sostenere progetti che promuovono la memoria storica e culturale dell'Europa. Attraverso finanziamenti, si intende incentivare iniziative che valorizzano la storia condivisa e le esperienze culturali, favorendo la cooperazione tra diverse nazioni e comunità. I progetti devono coinvolgere attivamente i cittadini e le istituzioni locali, contribuendo a una maggiore consapevolezza e apprezzamento del patrimonio culturale europeo.

Le proposte devono dimostrare un impatto significativo sulla qualità dei servizi offerti e sulla salute dei cittadini. Sono ammissibili progetti che prevedono l'acquisto di dispositivi medici, strumentazione diagnostica e tecnologie per la telemedicina.

abstract: La Fondazione intende mettere a disposizione degli Enti ammissibili a contributo attivi in tutto il territorio della Provincia di Cuneo, risorse finanziarie per incrementare la loro capacità progettuale in ambito regionale, nazionale ed europeo, favorendo così iniziative che possano promuovere lo sviluppo economico e culturale del territorio e del suo capitale sociale. title: DARE Foundation - Digital Lifelong Prevention
abstract: DARE Foundation - Digital Lifelong Prevention. Mi piace: 124 · 9 persone ne parlano. Innoviamo nella prevenzione sanitaria digitale attraverso ricerca, collaborazione e soluzioni avanzate.

title: Bando a cascata Spoke 3 - Progetto DARE
organization: Università degli Studi Roma Tor Vergata
abstract: Bando pubblico per la selezione di proposte progettuali, finalizzate all'implementazione di innovazioni tecnologiche 4.0 (big data, iot, ai) applicate alla prevenzione digitale, anche attraverso il trasferimento tecnologico.

title: Bando Ricerca 2024 - Fondazione del Monte
abstract: È online il bando per sostenere le attività di Ricerca Scientifica sui territori di Bologna e di Ravenna per il 2024. Il bando è aperto a progetti di ricerca innovativi e di alta qualità, con particolare attenzione a quelli che affrontano sfide sociali e ambientali. Le proposte devono essere presentate da enti di ricerca, università e altre istituzioni. Maggiori dettagli sono disponibili sul sito ufficiale.

title: Bando 𝗘𝗖𝗖𝗖𝗢! (II edizione) 𝗘ducazione – 𝗖ittadinanza – 𝗖omunità – 𝗖ollettività – 𝗢pportunità - Fondazione del Monte
abstract: La Fondazione del Monte, confermando il proprio impegno per la promozione di uno sviluppo sostenibile e inclusivo, persegue finalità di sostegno a progetti che favoriscano l'educazione, la cittadinanza attiva, la comunità e le opportunità per tutti. Il bando è aperto a iniziative che mirano a migliorare la qualità della vita e a promuovere l'inclusione sociale.

title: Bando Ricerca 2023 - Fondazione del Monte
abstract: È online il bando per sostenere le attività di Ricerca Scientifica sui territori di Bologna e di Ravenna per il finanziamento di progetti di ricerca innovativi. Il bando è aperto a ricercatori e istituzioni che operano in ambito scientifico e tecnologico, con l'obiettivo di promuovere la ricerca e l'innovazione nei settori di interesse per la Fondazione.

title: Bando locale - Fondazione Just Italia
abstract: Una risposta concreta alle esigenze sociali della collettività che ci ha visto nascere e crescere: questo è l’obiettivo del bando locale che ogni anno dedichiamo al territorio veronese. Ai progetti di portata nazionale Fondazione Just Italia affianca ogni

title: Bando nazionale
abstract: Fondazione Just Italia si impegna ogni giorno a dare vita a una possibilità di cambiamento per tante persone, garantendone il diritto a una vita piena di esperienze, benessere ed emozioni. Per questo ogni anno, dal 1° settembre al 31 ottobre, è attivo il

title: Bando per eventi folkloristici 2026
abstract: La Fondazione Perugia promuove il bando per eventi folkloristici 2026, volto a sostenere manifestazioni che valorizzino le tradizioni culturali locali. Il bando è aperto a enti pubblici e privati, associazioni e fondazioni, con l'obiettivo di incentivare la partecipazione della comunità e la promozione del patrimonio immateriale. Le proposte dovranno essere presentate entro la scadenza indicata.

title: Bando Ricerca 2025
abstract: Il Bando Ricerca 2025 è un'iniziativa della Fondazione Perugia per finanziare progetti di ricerca innovativi. Sono invitati a partecipare ricercatori e istituzioni che operano in vari ambiti scientifici. I progetti devono dimostrare un impatto significativo e contribuire allo sviluppo della conoscenza. La Fondazione mira a sostenere la ricerca di alta qualità e a promuovere collaborazioni tra diversi enti.

title: Bando Arte 2025: Luoghi in Comune
abstract: Il bando Arte 2025: Luoghi in Comune è un'iniziativa volta a sostenere progetti artistici che promuovano la partecipazione e l'inclusione sociale. Si rivolge a artisti, curatori e organizzazioni culturali che desiderano realizzare interventi artistici in spazi pubblici e comunitari. I progetti devono essere innovativi e in grado di coinvolgere attivamente la comunità locale, contribuendo a un dialogo tra arte e società.

title: Bando eventi culturali per la promozione del territorio 2026
abstract: La Fondazione Perugia promuove un bando per eventi culturali che valorizzino il territorio. Il bando è aperto a progetti che coinvolgano la comunità e favoriscano la partecipazione attiva dei cittadini. Le iniziative devono essere innovative e sostenibili, contribuendo alla crescita culturale e sociale della regione. Sono incoraggiati eventi che utilizzino risorse locali e che possano attrarre visitatori, stimolando l'economia locale.

title: Bando RICERCA
abstract: La Fondazione TIM promuove la ricerca scientifica e tecnologica attraverso il bando RICERCA, che sostiene progetti innovativi in vari ambiti. Il bando è aperto a enti di ricerca, università e startup, con l'obiettivo di favorire lo sviluppo di soluzioni tecnologiche avanzate. I progetti devono dimostrare un impatto significativo e la capacità di generare risultati concreti nel settore della ricerca.

title: Call for IDEAs – Inclusione Sociale
abstract: La Fondazione TIM promuove la Call for IDEAs – Inclusione Sociale, un'iniziativa volta a sostenere progetti innovativi che favoriscano l'inclusione sociale. L'obiettivo è finanziare idee che possano generare un impatto positivo nella comunità, migliorando la qualità della vita delle persone in situazioni di vulnerabilità. I progetti possono riguardare diverse aree, tra cui l'educazione, la salute e l'occupazione.

title: Bando SALUTE 2025
abstract: Il Bando SALUTE 2025 è un'iniziativa della Fondazione TIM che mira a finanziare progetti innovativi nel settore della salute. L'obiettivo è sostenere iniziative che possano migliorare la qualità della vita e la salute delle persone, promuovendo la ricerca e lo sviluppo di soluzioni tecnologiche avanzate. I progetti devono essere presentati da enti di ricerca, università e organizzazioni no-profit.

title: Bando INCLUSIONE
abstract: Il Bando Inclusione è un'iniziativa della Fondazione TIM che mira a sostenere progetti innovativi e inclusivi nel campo sociale. Attraverso questo bando, la Fondazione intende finanziare iniziative che promuovano l'inclusione sociale, l'innovazione e il benessere delle comunità. I progetti devono essere in grado di dimostrare un impatto positivo e misurabile, contribuendo a migliorare la qualità della vita delle persone coinvolte.

title: Bando "MicroProgetti di Sviluppo"
abstract: Il bando finanzia MicroProgetti a favore di comunità vulnerabili nei Paesi in Via di Sviluppo, promuovendo miglioramento sociale, autonomia e sostenibilità attraverso interventi in acqua, ambiente, sanità, lavoro ed educazione.

title: Bando "Ricerca Pediatrica 2025"
abstract: Il bando sostiene progetti di ricerca innovativi in ambito pediatrico, promuovendo attività scientifiche di eccellenza con l'obiettivo di migliorare cura e prevenzione delle malattie infantili.

title: Call for proposals di cooperazione delegata Grant/01/HealthPro2
abstract: Il bando mira a migliorare l'accesso e la qualità dei servizi di assistenza sanitaria primaria, nutrizione e WASH per comunità vulnerabili in Sudan, con focus su donne, ragazze e persone con disabilità.

title: Bando "IBSA Fellowship 2025"
abstract: Il bando IBSA Foundation Fellowship 2025 finanzia 6 borse di studio da €32.000 per giovani ricercatori in dermatologia, endocrinologia, fertilità, medicina del dolore, healthy aging e medicina rigenerativa.

title: Bando Ordinario a valere sui fondi dell'Otto per Mille della Chiesa Valdese 2026
abstract: Il bando sostiene progetti sociali, assistenziali, umanitari e culturali in Italia e all’estero, promuovendo inclusione, sviluppo sostenibile, tutela dei diritti e miglioramento della qualità della vita di comunità vulnerabili.

title: Call 3 - ICRAD
abstract: We are happy to announce that the third call of the Era-Net ICRAD (International coordination of research on infectious diseases) with the title “Helminth infections and changing climate: tackling the challenges for animal health” has successfully be finalised. 4 international collaborative research projects have been nominated for funding. The projects were selected out of 11

title: Call 1 - ICRAD
abstract: First call of Era-Net ICRAD (International coordination of research on infectious diseases) has been a success with funding 19 Transnational Collaborative Research Projects, including partners from 20 different countries.

title: Student Grant Scheme - The Animal Welfare Foundation
abstract: The AWF student grants scheme gives students with a passion for animal welfare the opportunity to develop their research skills.

title: Accessibility Grants — ASAB
abstract: Grants of up to £500 to facilitate ASAB conference or workshop attendance by members with individual needs such as disability or medical needs

title: Conference Attendance Grants — ASAB
abstract: Conference Attendance Grants help PhD students and others with limited funds to attend ASAB conferences and workshops

title: Contrastare la violenza - Cervitalia
abstract: Il bando mira a finanziare progetti che affrontano la violenza di genere, promuovendo la sensibilizzazione e la prevenzione. Sono incoraggiati approcci innovativi e collaborazioni tra enti pubblici e privati. I progetti devono dimostrare un impatto significativo e sostenibile nella comunità. Le proposte devono includere strategie di monitoraggio e valutazione per misurare i risultati e l'efficacia delle iniziative.

title: Partecipazione dei cittadini - Cervitalia
abstract: Il programma di partecipazione dei cittadini mira a coinvolgere attivamente le comunità locali nella definizione e implementazione di politiche pubbliche. Attraverso un approccio collaborativo, si intende promuovere la co-creazione di soluzioni innovative che rispondano alle esigenze specifiche dei cittadini. Le iniziative possono includere workshop, consultazioni pubbliche e progetti pilota, con l'obiettivo di rafforzare il legame tra cittadini e istituzioni.

title: Promuovere i diritti - Cervitalia
abstract: Il programma "Promuovere i diritti" è un'iniziativa volta a sostenere progetti che mirano a promuovere e difendere i diritti umani, con particolare attenzione alle categorie vulnerabili. I progetti possono riguardare attività di sensibilizzazione, formazione e advocacy, e devono essere realizzati in collaborazione con enti locali e organizzazioni della società civile.

title: Bando CERV-2024-CITIZENS-VALUES
abstract: CERV Call for proposals for civil society organisations active on protecting and promoting Union values: call to intermediaries (giving financial support to third parties)

title: I valori dell’Unione - Cervitalia
abstract: Il bando "I valori dell’Unione" mira a sostenere progetti che promuovono i valori fondamentali dell’Unione Europea, come la democrazia, i diritti umani e la solidarietà. I progetti devono coinvolgere attivamente i cittadini e le comunità locali, favorendo la partecipazione e l’inclusione sociale. Saranno valutati positivamente i progetti che dimostrano un impatto significativo e sostenibile.

title: Bimbi in Gamba - ZeroSei
abstract: Il progetto "Bimbi in Gamba - ZeroSei" si propone di promuovere il benessere e la crescita dei bambini da 0 a 6 anni, attraverso interventi mirati che coinvolgono famiglie, educatori e comunità. Si intende sviluppare attività educative e di supporto, favorendo l'inclusione sociale e il miglioramento della qualità della vita dei più piccoli. Il progetto si basa su un approccio integrato e multidisciplinare, con l'obiettivo di garantire un ambiente stimolante e sicuro per la crescita dei bambini.

title: Linee guida per promuovere l'adozione di sani stili di vita
abstract: La Compagnia di San Paolo intende promuovere l’adozione di sani stili di vita attraverso un bando che supporti progetti innovativi. L’obiettivo è migliorare la salute e il benessere delle persone, in particolare nei contesti più vulnerabili. I progetti dovranno affrontare tematiche come l'alimentazione, l'attività fisica e la salute mentale, coinvolgendo attivamente le comunità locali.

title: Sportivi per natura: il benessere circolare tra natura, movimento e vita sana
abstract: Il bando "Sportivi per natura" è un'iniziativa della Compagnia di San Paolo che mira a promuovere il benessere attraverso l'attività fisica all'aperto e la connessione con la natura. Il progetto si propone di sostenere iniziative che incoraggiano la partecipazione a sport e attività fisiche in contesti naturali, favorendo un approccio sostenibile e inclusivo. Le proposte devono dimostrare un impatto positivo sulla comunità e promuovere stili di vita sani.

title: CEF Digital 2025 - Platforms Works
abstract: The CEF Digital 2025 - Platforms Works aims to support the deployment of digital platforms that enhance connectivity and digital services across Europe. This initiative focuses on projects that promote interoperability, scalability, and sustainability of digital infrastructures, ensuring that they meet the needs of citizens and businesses alike. The funding will facilitate the development of innovative solutions that leverage advanced technologies to improve digital access and services.

title: ED-2025-GREECE-FPA
abstract: The ED-2025-GREECE-FPA call aims to support projects that enhance the capacity of Greek organizations to participate in European research and innovation initiatives. It focuses on fostering collaboration, knowledge transfer, and the development of innovative solutions to address societal challenges. The call encourages partnerships between public and private sectors, aiming to strengthen the overall research ecosystem in Greece.

title: Erasmus+ Call for Proposals 2026 - VET Learning Activities
abstract: The Erasmus+ programme supports education, training, youth, and sport in Europe. The 2026 call focuses on vocational education and training (VET) learning activities, aiming to enhance skills and employability through international mobility and cooperation. Projects should foster innovation, inclusivity, and quality in VET, promoting partnerships among organizations across Europe.

title: INNOVFUND-2025-AUC-H2-RFNBO-GENERAL
abstract: The INNOVFUND-2025-AUC-H2-RFNBO-GENERAL call aims to support innovative projects in the field of renewable hydrogen production and utilization. It focuses on advancing technologies that contribute to the decarbonization of the economy and the transition to a sustainable energy system. Projects should demonstrate high potential for innovation and scalability, addressing the challenges of hydrogen production from renewable sources.

title: HORIZON-CL6-2025-03-GOVERNANCE-13
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation projects that address governance challenges in various sectors. It focuses on enhancing the effectiveness of governance systems, promoting citizen engagement, and ensuring transparency and accountability in decision-making processes. Projects should demonstrate innovative approaches and methodologies to tackle these issues, fostering collaboration among stakeholders and contributing to the development of sustainable governance models.

title: HORIZON-CL5-2025-06-D1-04
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation projects that address the challenges of climate change, energy transition, and sustainable development. It encourages collaboration among various stakeholders, including academia, industry, and public authorities, to develop innovative solutions that contribute to the EU's climate goals and enhance the resilience of communities.

title: EUBA-EFSA-2025-PLANTS-01-01-Lot1
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation in the field of plant health, focusing on the development of new tools and strategies to manage plant pests and diseases. The objective is to enhance the resilience of European agriculture and ensure food security. Proposals should address specific challenges related to plant health and demonstrate a clear impact on sustainable agricultural practices.

title: ED-2025-SLOVENIA-FPA
abstract: The ED-2025-SLOVENIA-FPA aims to support the development of innovative solutions in various sectors, enhancing the capacity of organizations in Slovenia to engage in research and innovation activities. This initiative focuses on fostering collaboration among stakeholders and promoting sustainable practices that align with European Union objectives.

title: RFCS-2025-02-PDP
abstract: The RFCS Programme supports research and innovation in the steel sector, focusing on sustainable development, competitiveness, and innovation. The call aims to fund projects that address key challenges in the sector, including environmental sustainability, resource efficiency, and digital transformation. Proposals should demonstrate a clear impact on the steel industry and align with EU policies.

title: Erasmus+ Call for Proposals 2026 - VET
abstract: The Erasmus+ Programme supports education, training, youth, and sport in Europe. The 2026 Call for Proposals focuses on vocational education and training (VET) projects that enhance skills and employability. It aims to foster innovation and collaboration among educational institutions, businesses, and organizations to improve the quality of VET across Europe.

title: EU Funding & Tenders Portal
abstract: The Funding and Tenders Portal is the single entry point (the Single Electronic Data Interchange Area) for applicants, contractors and experts in funding programmes and procurements managed by the European Commission.

title: Competitive Calls for Proposals
abstract: The Funding and Tenders Portal is the single entry point for applicants, contractors and experts in funding programmes and procurements managed by the European Commission.

title: HORIZON-CL5-2026-02-D3-24
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation projects that address the challenges of climate change, energy transition, and sustainable development. It encourages collaboration among various stakeholders, including academia, industry, and public authorities, to develop innovative solutions that contribute to the EU's climate goals and enhance the competitiveness of European industries.

title: LIFE-2025-SAP-CLIMA-CCM
abstract: The LIFE Programme is the EU's funding instrument for the environment and climate action. It aims to contribute to the implementation, updating and development of EU environmental and climate policy and legislation by co-financing projects with European added value. The LIFE Programme supports projects in various areas, including nature and biodiversity, circular economy, and climate change mitigation and adaptation.

title: DIGITAL-IRIS2-2025-QCI-01
abstract: The DIGITAL-IRIS2-2025-QCI-01 call aims to enhance the European Quantum Communication Infrastructure (QCI) by supporting the development of quantum communication technologies and services. This initiative seeks to foster collaboration among stakeholders, including industry, academia, and public authorities, to create a secure and resilient quantum communication ecosystem in Europe. The call encourages innovative projects that address the challenges of quantum communication and contribute to the strategic objectives of the European Union.

title: HORIZON-CL5-2025-04-D6-02
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation activities that contribute to the European Green Deal and the digital transformation of the economy. It focuses on sustainable and smart mobility, energy efficiency, and the circular economy, promoting the development of innovative solutions and technologies. The call encourages collaboration among stakeholders to address societal challenges and enhance competitiveness in the European market.

title: HORIZON-HLTH-2025-01-TOOL-05
abstract: This call aims to support the development of innovative tools and methodologies for health research. It focuses on enhancing the efficiency and effectiveness of health research processes, promoting collaboration among stakeholders, and ensuring the integration of health data across different sectors. The expected outcomes include improved health outcomes, increased patient engagement, and better resource allocation in health research.

title: HORIZON-CL6-2025-03-GOVERNANCE-04
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation projects that address governance challenges in the context of the European Green Deal. It focuses on enhancing the role of governance in achieving sustainability and resilience in various sectors, including energy, transport, and agriculture. The projects should foster collaboration among stakeholders and promote innovative solutions that align with EU policies.

title: EU Funding & Tenders Portal
abstract: The Funding and Tenders Portal is the single entry point (the Single Electronic Data Interchange Area) for applicants, contractors and experts in funding programmes and procurements managed by the European Commission.

title: HORIZON-CL4-INDUSTRY-2025-01-TWIN-TRANSITION-33
abstract: This call aims to support the twin transition of industry towards a sustainable and digital economy. It focuses on enhancing the competitiveness of European industry through innovative solutions that address climate change and digital transformation. Projects should demonstrate clear impacts on sustainability and digitalization, fostering collaboration between various stakeholders in the industrial ecosystem.

title: HORIZON-CL4-INDUSTRY-2025-01-MATERIALS-44
abstract: This call aims to support the development of advanced materials and manufacturing processes that are sustainable, efficient, and competitive. It focuses on innovative solutions that enhance the circular economy, reduce environmental impact, and improve resource efficiency. Proposals should address the entire value chain, from material design to production and recycling, ensuring that the developed technologies are scalable and applicable in real-world scenarios.

title: HORIZON-CL4-2025-02-SPACE-43
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation in the field of space technologies and applications. It focuses on enhancing the competitiveness of the European space sector, fostering collaboration among stakeholders, and addressing key challenges in space exploration and utilization. Projects should aim to develop innovative solutions that contribute to the EU's strategic objectives in space.

title: Sustainable Management of Plastics in the Circular Economy
abstract: This call aims to support projects that contribute to the sustainable management of plastics in the circular economy. It focuses on innovative solutions for reducing plastic waste, enhancing recycling processes, and promoting the use of alternative materials. Projects should address the entire lifecycle of plastics, from production to disposal, and involve stakeholders across the value chain.

title: ED-2025-LITHUANIA-FPA
abstract: The ED-2025-LITHUANIA-FPA aims to support the development of innovative solutions in various fields, enhancing research and innovation capacities in Lithuania. This initiative focuses on fostering collaboration between academia and industry, promoting sustainable practices, and addressing societal challenges through targeted funding and resources.

title: HORIZON-WIDERA-2025-06-ERA-01
abstract: This call aims to support the establishment of a European Research Area (ERA) by fostering collaboration among research and innovation stakeholders. It focuses on enhancing the effectiveness of national research systems and promoting transnational cooperation. The initiative seeks to address societal challenges and improve the impact of research and innovation on the economy and society.

title: HORIZON-CL5-2025-02-D3-15
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation projects that address the challenges of climate change and environmental degradation. It focuses on developing sustainable solutions and technologies that can be implemented across various sectors, including energy, transport, and agriculture. The projects should promote collaboration between academia, industry, and public authorities to foster innovation and enhance the EU's competitiveness in the global market.

title: DIGITAL-ECCC-2025-DEPLOY-CYBER-08-CYBERHEALTH
abstract: This call aims to support the deployment of innovative digital health solutions that enhance the resilience of health systems in Europe. Projects should focus on the integration of digital technologies in healthcare, improving patient outcomes, and ensuring data security and privacy. The initiative encourages collaboration among stakeholders, including healthcare providers, technology developers, and researchers, to foster a comprehensive approach to digital health.

title: HORIZON-JU-EUROHPC-2026-COE-LH-01-02
abstract: This call aims to support the establishment of Centres of Excellence (CoEs) in the field of High Performance Computing (HPC) and Quantum Computing (QC). The CoEs will provide expertise, training, and support to users in various scientific and industrial domains, enhancing the use of HPC and QC technologies across Europe. The initiative seeks to foster collaboration between academia and industry, driving innovation and competitiveness in the European research landscape.

title: ED-2025-MALTA-FPA
abstract: The Funding and Tenders Portal is the single entry point (the Single Electronic Data Interchange Area) for applicants, contractors and experts in funding programmes and procurements managed by the European Commission.

title: DIGITAL-ECCC-2025-DEPLOY-CYBER-09-COORDPREP
abstract: This call aims to support the coordination and preparation of projects in the area of cybersecurity. It focuses on enhancing the resilience of digital infrastructures and promoting collaboration among stakeholders. The initiative seeks to address emerging threats and vulnerabilities in the digital landscape, fostering innovation and research in cybersecurity solutions.

title: HORIZON-JU-ER-2025-FA4-01
abstract: The HORIZON-JU-ER-2025-FA4-01 call aims to support innovative research and development projects in the field of energy. It encourages collaboration between academia and industry to foster advancements in sustainable energy technologies. Projects should focus on reducing carbon emissions and enhancing energy efficiency, aligning with the EU's climate goals. Successful proposals will demonstrate clear pathways to commercialization and societal impact.

title: HORIZON-CL4-2025-03-DIGITAL-EMERGING-08
abstract: This call aims to support the development of digital technologies that enhance the competitiveness of European industry. It focuses on areas such as artificial intelligence, advanced computing, and cybersecurity, promoting innovation and collaboration among stakeholders. Projects should demonstrate clear societal and economic impacts, aligning with EU policies and strategies for digital transformation.

title: HORIZON-CL4-INDUSTRY-2025-01-TWIN-TRANSITION
abstract: This call aims to support the twin transition of industry towards a sustainable and digital future. It focuses on enhancing the competitiveness of European industry through innovative solutions that address climate change and digital transformation. Projects should demonstrate a clear impact on the green and digital transitions, fostering collaboration between various stakeholders and sectors.

title: INNOVFUND-2025-AUC-H2-RFNBOLOWCARB-MAR-AVI
abstract: The INNOVFUND-2025-AUC-H2-RFNBOLOWCARB-MAR-AVI call aims to support innovative projects that contribute to the decarbonization of the economy through the development and deployment of renewable hydrogen technologies. This initiative focuses on low-carbon solutions in the aviation sector, promoting the use of renewable fuels and reducing greenhouse gas emissions. The call encourages collaboration among stakeholders to enhance the transition towards sustainable energy systems.

The call encourages collaboration among stakeholders, including academia, industry, and public authorities, to foster innovation and drive the transition towards a greener energy system.

The initiative encourages innovative approaches to address societal challenges and aims to strengthen the European research landscape.

abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation projects that contribute to the Farm to Fork Strategy, focusing on sustainable food systems, food security, and nutrition. Projects should address challenges related to food production, processing, distribution, and consumption, while promoting environmental sustainability and social equity. The call encourages interdisciplinary approaches and collaboration among stakeholders across the food value chain.

title: LIFE 2025 Call for Proposals
abstract: The LIFE Programme is the EU's funding instrument for the environment and climate action. It aims to contribute to the implementation, updating and development of EU environmental and climate policy and legislation by co-financing projects with European added value. The LIFE Programme supports projects in various areas, including nature and biodiversity, circular economy, and climate change mitigation and adaptation.

title: ERC-2026-PERA
abstract: The ERC-2026-PERA call aims to support pioneering research projects that push the boundaries of knowledge and innovation. It encourages high-risk, high-reward research across all fields of science and technology, fostering groundbreaking discoveries and advancements. The call is open to individual researchers and teams, promoting interdisciplinary collaboration and the integration of diverse perspectives in tackling complex challenges.

title: HORIZON-CL6-2025-03-GOVERNANCE-09
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation projects that address governance challenges in the context of the European Green Deal. It focuses on enhancing the role of governance in achieving sustainability and resilience in various sectors, including energy, transport, and agriculture. Projects should aim to develop innovative solutions and foster collaboration among stakeholders to implement effective governance frameworks.

title: DIGITAL-ECCC-2026-DEPLOY-CYBER-10-CBCH
abstract: The call aims to support the deployment of cybersecurity capabilities across the EU, enhancing the resilience of critical infrastructures and services. It focuses on fostering collaboration among stakeholders, including public authorities, private sector entities, and academia, to address emerging cyber threats. Projects should demonstrate innovative approaches to cybersecurity, ensuring alignment with EU policies and standards.

title: HORIZON-HLTH-2025-01-DISEASE-04
abstract: This call aims to support research projects that address the challenges posed by diseases, focusing on innovative solutions and methodologies. The projects should aim to improve health outcomes and enhance the quality of life for patients. Collaboration among various stakeholders, including academia, industry, and healthcare providers, is encouraged to foster a multidisciplinary approach to disease management.

title: Erasmus+ Capacity Building in Higher Education
abstract: The Erasmus+ programme aims to enhance the quality of higher education in partner countries through international cooperation. It supports projects that promote the modernization of higher education institutions, improve their governance, and foster the development of new curricula and teaching methods. The programme encourages partnerships between higher education institutions in Europe and those in partner countries, facilitating knowledge exchange and capacity building.

title: EU4H-2026-SANTE-PJ-05
abstract: The EU4Health Programme aims to improve and foster health in the EU by addressing health challenges and enhancing the resilience of health systems. This call focuses on projects that promote health and prevent diseases, ensuring that health systems are prepared for future challenges. It encourages collaboration among stakeholders to develop innovative solutions and share best practices across member states.

title: HORIZON-CL5-2025-04-D5-18
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation projects that address the challenges of climate change, energy transition, and sustainable development. It encourages collaboration among various stakeholders, including academia, industry, and public authorities, to develop innovative solutions that contribute to the EU's climate goals and enhance the competitiveness of European industries.

title: HORIZON-CL6-2025-02-FARM2FORK-02 two-stage
abstract: This call aims to support projects that enhance the sustainability and resilience of food systems. It focuses on innovative solutions that address challenges in food production, processing, and distribution, promoting a circular economy and reducing environmental impacts. Proposals should demonstrate clear pathways to implementation and stakeholder engagement, ensuring alignment with EU policies and objectives.

title: HORIZON-CL6-2025-01-ZEROPOLLUTION-07

It focuses on developing solutions for pollution reduction in air, water, and soil, promoting sustainable practices, and enhancing the circular economy. Projects should address the interlinkages between pollution and health, biodiversity, and climate change, ensuring a holistic approach to environmental challenges.

It focuses on sustainable and inclusive growth, addressing climate change, and enhancing the resilience of the EU economy. Projects should demonstrate innovative solutions and technologies that can be scaled up and implemented across Europe.

title: EU4H-2026-SANTE-PJ-07
abstract: The EU4Health Programme aims to improve and foster health in the EU. It focuses on enhancing health systems, promoting health and preventing diseases, and ensuring access to healthcare. The programme supports projects that address health challenges, strengthen health systems, and improve health outcomes across Europe.

title: Erasmus+ Virtual Exchange: Support for the implementation of the Virtual Exchange programme

It provides opportunities for youth to engage in virtual exchanges, enhancing their skills and competencies in a global context. The programme supports the development of innovative digital tools and methodologies to facilitate these exchanges, promoting inclusivity and accessibility for all participants.

title: LIFE Programme - Technical Assistance for Climate Action
abstract: The LIFE Programme is the EU's funding instrument for the environment and climate action. It aims to contribute to the implementation, updating and development of EU environmental and climate policy and legislation by co-financing projects with European added value. The Technical Assistance for Climate Action (TA-PP-CLIMA) aims to support the preparation of project proposals for the LIFE Programme.

title: HORIZON-EIC-2025-PRIZE-WIP-WomenInnovatorsCategory
abstract: The Women Innovators Prize aims to recognize and reward women innovators who have made significant contributions to the development of innovative products, services, or processes. This initiative is part of the European Innovation Council's efforts to promote gender equality in innovation and entrepreneurship. The prize will highlight the achievements of women in innovation and encourage more women to engage in entrepreneurial activities.

title: Participant register | EU Funding & Tenders Portal
abstract: If you want to participate in a call for proposals or in a call for tenders with eSubmission, your organisation needs to be registered and have a 9-digit Participant Identification Code (PIC). Please quote your PIC in all correspondence with the Commission.

The focus is on fostering innovation and creativity in the production and distribution of audiovisual content, particularly in the context of digital transformation and the evolving media landscape.

The call seeks to foster collaboration among various stakeholders, including sports organizations, educational institutions, and local authorities, to create sustainable and impactful projects that contribute to the overall development of sports in Europe.

title: LIFE Programme - Call for proposals 2025

title: HORIZON-HLTH-2025-03-DISEASE-02-two-stage
abstract: This call aims to support research projects that address the challenges of disease prevention and management. It focuses on innovative approaches to improve health outcomes and enhance the quality of life for patients. The projects should involve multidisciplinary teams and foster collaboration across sectors, including academia, industry, and healthcare providers.

title: DIGITAL-JU-CHIPS-2025-CSA-DET
abstract: The DIGITAL-JU-CHIPS-2025-CSA-DET aims to support the development of a European semiconductor ecosystem. This initiative focuses on enhancing research and innovation in semiconductor technologies, fostering collaboration among stakeholders, and addressing the challenges in the supply chain. The project will facilitate knowledge transfer and promote the integration of advanced semiconductor solutions across various sectors, ensuring Europe's competitiveness in the global market.

title: DIGITAL-IRIS2-2025-QCI-03
abstract: The DIGITAL-IRIS2-2025-QCI-03 call aims to support the development of quantum communication infrastructure in Europe. It focuses on enhancing the security and efficiency of quantum communication systems, promoting collaboration among stakeholders, and fostering innovation in quantum technologies. The initiative seeks to establish a robust framework for quantum communication that can be integrated into existing networks, ensuring a secure digital future for Europe.

title: HORIZON-CL6-2025-01-BIODIV-10
abstract: This call aims to support projects that enhance biodiversity and ecosystem services in Europe. It focuses on innovative solutions to address biodiversity loss, promote sustainable land use, and improve ecosystem resilience. Projects should involve multi-stakeholder partnerships and demonstrate measurable impacts on biodiversity conservation and ecosystem restoration.

title: HORIZON-CL6-2025-01-CIRCBIO-04
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation in the field of circular bioeconomy. It focuses on developing sustainable solutions that enhance the use of biological resources while minimizing waste and environmental impact. Projects should address challenges related to the circularity of bio-based systems, including the integration of new technologies and practices that promote sustainability and resource efficiency.

title: HORIZON-MISS-2025-02-CANCER-05
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation projects that address the challenges posed by cancer. It focuses on developing innovative solutions for cancer prevention, diagnosis, and treatment, with an emphasis on personalized medicine and patient-centered approaches. The projects should foster collaboration among various stakeholders, including academia, industry, and healthcare providers, to enhance the effectiveness of cancer care and improve patient outcomes.

title: Erasmus+ Capacity Building in Higher Education
abstract: The Erasmus+ Capacity Building in Higher Education (CBHE) action supports the modernization, accessibility, and internationalization of higher education in partner countries. It aims to enhance the quality of higher education and promote cooperation between higher education institutions in Europe and those in partner countries. The action encourages the development of innovative practices and the sharing of knowledge and experience.

title: HORIZON-CL5-2025-02-D2-03
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation projects that address the challenges of climate change and environmental sustainability. It focuses on developing innovative solutions and technologies that can contribute to the EU's climate goals and promote a sustainable economy. Projects should demonstrate a clear impact on reducing greenhouse gas emissions and enhancing resilience to climate change.

title: HORIZON-MISS-2025-02-CANCER-03
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation projects that address cancer prevention, diagnosis, and treatment. It focuses on improving patient outcomes and enhancing the quality of life for cancer patients. The initiative encourages collaboration among various stakeholders, including academia, industry, and healthcare providers, to develop innovative solutions and technologies in the field of oncology.

title: HORIZON-CL4-2025-03-HUMAN-15
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation in the field of human-centric digital technologies. It focuses on enhancing the digital transformation of industries and services, promoting the development of advanced technologies that are user-friendly and accessible. The initiative encourages collaboration among stakeholders to foster innovation and improve the overall user experience in digital environments.

title: Competitive Calls for Proposals
abstract: The Funding and Tenders Portal is the single entry point for applicants, contractors and experts in funding programmes and procurements managed by the European Commission.

title: HORIZON-CL3-2025-01-FCT-01
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation activities in the area of cybersecurity, focusing on the development of advanced technologies and solutions to enhance the resilience of critical infrastructures. Projects should address the challenges posed by emerging threats and vulnerabilities, fostering collaboration among stakeholders to ensure a secure digital environment.

title: HORIZON-NEB-2025-01-PARTICIPATION-04
abstract: This call aims to support projects that enhance participation in the Horizon Europe programme, focusing on the involvement of diverse stakeholders in research and innovation activities. It encourages collaboration among various sectors and disciplines to address societal challenges and promote sustainable development. The initiative seeks to foster inclusivity and broaden access to funding opportunities for underrepresented groups.

title: EU4Health 2026 - Project Grants
abstract: The EU4Health Programme aims to improve and foster health in the EU. It supports projects that address health challenges, enhance health systems, and promote health equity. The call for projects focuses on innovative solutions to improve health outcomes, strengthen health systems, and ensure access to quality healthcare. Projects should align with EU health priorities and demonstrate sustainability and impact.

title: HORIZON-CL3-2025-01-FCT-04
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation activities in the field of cybersecurity, focusing on the development of advanced technologies and solutions to enhance the resilience of critical infrastructures against cyber threats. The call encourages collaboration among stakeholders, including academia, industry, and public authorities, to foster innovation and improve the overall cybersecurity landscape in Europe.

title: INNOVFUND-2025-NZT-GENERAL-LSP
abstract: The INNOVFUND-2025-NZT-GENERAL-LSP call aims to support innovative projects that contribute to the decarbonization of the economy. It focuses on projects that can demonstrate significant reductions in greenhouse gas emissions and promote the transition to a sustainable energy system. The call encourages applications from various sectors, including energy, transport, and industry, and aims to foster collaboration among stakeholders to achieve impactful results.

title: HORIZON-CL5-2026-01-D5-17
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation projects that contribute to the European Green Deal and the digital transformation of the economy. It focuses on sustainable technologies, climate change mitigation, and the circular economy, encouraging collaboration among stakeholders to achieve impactful results.

title: CERV-2025-OG-DISA-SGA
abstract: The CERV Programme aims to promote and protect the values of the European Union, including democracy, the rule of law, and fundamental rights. This call focuses on projects that foster social inclusion, equality, and the active participation of citizens in democratic life. It supports initiatives that address the challenges faced by vulnerable groups and promote civic engagement across Europe.

title: ED-2025-SLOVAKIA-FPA
abstract: The ED-2025-SLOVAKIA-FPA aims to support the development of innovative solutions in various sectors, enhancing research and innovation capabilities in Slovakia. This initiative encourages collaboration among stakeholders to address societal challenges and promote sustainable growth. The program focuses on fostering partnerships and leveraging resources to maximize impact and effectiveness in achieving strategic objectives.

title: Erasmus+ Youth 2026 - Capacity Building in the Western Balkans
abstract: The Erasmus+ programme aims to enhance the quality of youth work and promote cooperation among youth organizations in the Western Balkans. This call focuses on capacity building projects that foster collaboration, exchange of best practices, and the development of innovative approaches to youth work. Projects should address the needs of young people and support their active participation in society.

title: DIGITAL-JU-CHIPS-2025-SG-SSOI
abstract: The DIGITAL-JU-CHIPS-2025-SG-SSOI call aims to support research and innovation in the field of semiconductor technologies. It focuses on enhancing the European semiconductor ecosystem, fostering collaboration among stakeholders, and addressing key challenges in the supply chain. The initiative seeks to strengthen Europe's position in the global semiconductor market by promoting cutting-edge research and development activities.

title: HORIZON-CL5-2025-05-Two-Stage-D1-05
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation projects that address the challenges of climate change, energy transition, and sustainable development. It encourages collaboration among various stakeholders, including academia, industry, and public authorities, to develop innovative solutions that contribute to the EU's climate goals. Projects should focus on technological advancements, policy development, and societal engagement to ensure a comprehensive approach to sustainability.

title: HORIZON-INFRA-2025-01-EOSC-04
abstract: This call aims to support the development of the European Open Science Cloud (EOSC) by funding projects that enhance the EOSC ecosystem. It focuses on improving the interoperability of research infrastructures and services, fostering collaboration among stakeholders, and ensuring that data is accessible and reusable across disciplines. The projects should contribute to the sustainability and scalability of the EOSC, addressing the needs of researchers and promoting open science practices.

title: HORIZON-CL4-INDUSTRY-2025-01-MATERIALS-61
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation in materials, focusing on advanced materials and their applications in various industries. The objective is to enhance the competitiveness of European industry by fostering the development of innovative materials that meet the needs of the market. Proposals should address the entire value chain, from material design to processing and application, ensuring sustainability and circularity.

title: HORIZON-JU-SNS-2025-01-STREAM-B-02
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation in the field of sustainable and smart mobility. It focuses on developing solutions that enhance the efficiency and sustainability of transport systems, addressing challenges such as climate change, urbanization, and digitalization. The initiative encourages collaboration among stakeholders to foster innovation and improve the overall quality of life in urban areas.

title: HORIZON-CL5-2025-04-D5-05
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation in the field of climate change mitigation and adaptation. It focuses on developing solutions that enhance resilience and sustainability in various sectors, including energy, transport, and agriculture. The call encourages interdisciplinary approaches and collaboration among stakeholders to address the challenges posed by climate change effectively.

title: CERV-2025-CITIZENS-REM-HOLOCAUSTJEW
abstract: The CERV-2025-CITIZENS-REM-HOLOCAUSTJEW call aims to support projects that promote remembrance of the Holocaust and the fight against antisemitism. It encourages initiatives that foster education, research, and awareness-raising activities related to the Holocaust, ensuring that the memory of the victims is preserved and that the lessons learned are passed on to future generations.

title: HORIZON-CL4-2025-02-SPACE-11
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation in the field of space technologies and applications. It focuses on enhancing the competitiveness of the European space sector, fostering collaboration among stakeholders, and addressing key challenges in space exploration and utilization. Projects should aim to develop innovative solutions that contribute to the European Space Strategy and promote sustainable growth in the space economy.

The call encourages interdisciplinary approaches and collaboration among various stakeholders to foster a more resilient and inclusive society.

title: HORIZON-CL5-2025-04-D5-13
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation in the field of climate change mitigation and adaptation, focusing on the development of innovative solutions and technologies. Projects should address the challenges posed by climate change and contribute to the EU's climate goals, enhancing resilience and sustainability across various sectors.

title: HORIZON-CL6-2025-01-ZEROPOLLUTION-05
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation actions that contribute to the EU's zero pollution ambition. It focuses on developing solutions to reduce pollution in air, water, and soil, promoting a circular economy, and enhancing biodiversity. Projects should address the interlinkages between pollution and health, and foster the transition towards sustainable practices. The call encourages collaboration among stakeholders to achieve impactful results.

title: HORIZON-CL3-2025-02-CS-ECCC-06
abstract: This call aims to support the development of innovative solutions for enhancing the resilience of critical infrastructures against cyber threats. It focuses on fostering collaboration between public and private sectors, promoting research and innovation in cybersecurity, and ensuring the protection of essential services. Projects should address specific challenges related to the security of critical infrastructures, including energy, transport, and health sectors.

title: HORIZON-WIDERA-2025-04-ACCESS-01
abstract: This call aims to support the development of a European Research Area (ERA) by enhancing access to research and innovation funding for all regions. It focuses on fostering collaboration among stakeholders and promoting the integration of research and innovation into regional development strategies. The initiative seeks to address disparities in access to funding and resources, ensuring that all regions can benefit from the opportunities provided by the European Union.

title: HORIZON-CL2-2025-01-DEMOCRACY-05
abstract: This call aims to support projects that enhance democracy and democratic processes in Europe. It focuses on innovative solutions that address challenges faced by democratic institutions and processes, promoting citizen engagement and participation. The projects should contribute to the development of new tools and methodologies that strengthen democratic governance and foster inclusive decision-making.

title: HORIZON-CL6-2025-01-ZEROPOLLUTION-03
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation actions that contribute to the EU's zero pollution ambition. It focuses on developing solutions to reduce pollution in air, water, and soil, enhancing the quality of life and health of citizens. Projects should address the sources of pollution and promote sustainable practices, aligning with the EU Green Deal objectives.

title: JUST-2026-JCOO
abstract: The JUST-2026-JCOO call aims to support projects that promote the rights of children and young people in the EU. It focuses on enhancing their participation in decision-making processes and fostering their social inclusion. The call encourages innovative approaches and collaboration among various stakeholders, including NGOs, public authorities, and educational institutions.

title: EUBA-EFSA-2025-PLANTS-05-02-Lot2
abstract: This call aims to support research projects that address the challenges of plant health and food safety in the EU. It focuses on innovative solutions for pest and disease management, enhancing the resilience of crops, and ensuring sustainable agricultural practices. Projects should demonstrate a clear impact on policy and practice, fostering collaboration among stakeholders in the agricultural sector.

title: CERV-2025-CITIZENS-REM-TRANSITION
abstract: The CERV programme aims to promote and protect the rights and values of the European Union. It supports projects that foster civic engagement, promote democracy, and enhance the role of citizens in the EU. This call focuses on the transition towards a more inclusive and sustainable society, addressing challenges such as social inequality, discrimination, and the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on communities.

title: HORIZON-JU-SNS-2025-01-STREAM-B-01-01
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation in the field of sustainable energy systems. It focuses on developing advanced technologies and solutions that enhance energy efficiency and reduce greenhouse gas emissions. Projects should address the integration of renewable energy sources and promote sustainable practices across various sectors.

title: HORIZON-CL5-2025-01-Two-Stage-D2-02
abstract: The Funding and Tenders Portal is the single entry point (the Single Electronic Data Interchange Area) for applicants, contractors and experts in funding programmes and procurements managed by the European Commission.

title: HORIZON-CL6-2025-03-GOVERNANCE-07
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation projects that address governance challenges in the context of the European Green Deal. It focuses on enhancing the role of governance in achieving sustainable development and fostering inclusive and participatory decision-making processes. Projects should aim to develop innovative solutions and tools that can be implemented at various levels of governance.

title: EU Funding & Tenders Portal
abstract: The Funding and Tenders Portal is the single entry point (the Single Electronic Data Interchange Area) for applicants, contractors and experts in funding programmes and procurements managed by the European Commission.

title: LIFE-2025-STRAT-CLIMA-SIP-two-stage
abstract: The LIFE Programme is the EU's funding instrument for the environment and climate action. It aims to contribute to the implementation, updating and development of EU environmental and climate policy and legislation by co-financing projects with European added value. The LIFE Programme supports projects in various areas, including nature and biodiversity, circular economy, and climate change mitigation and adaptation.

title: ED-2025-CYPRUS-FPA
abstract: The ED-2025-CYPRUS-FPA call aims to support projects that enhance the capacity of Cyprus to address the challenges of the digital transition and to promote sustainable development. It focuses on fostering innovation, improving digital skills, and enhancing the overall competitiveness of the Cypriot economy through targeted funding initiatives.

title: HORIZON-CL3-2025-02-CS-ECCC-04
abstract: This call aims to support the development of innovative solutions for the security of citizens and communities in Europe. It focuses on enhancing the resilience of critical infrastructures and improving the response capabilities of public authorities. Proposals should address the integration of advanced technologies and methodologies to tackle emerging security challenges, ensuring a comprehensive approach to safety and security.

title: HORIZON-MISS-2025-05-SOIL-04
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation projects that address soil health and sustainable land management. It focuses on developing solutions to enhance soil quality, promote biodiversity, and mitigate climate change impacts. Projects should involve interdisciplinary approaches and stakeholder engagement to ensure effective implementation and dissemination of results.

title: CREA-MEDIA-2026-DEVSLATE
abstract: The DEVSLATE action aims to support the development of innovative audiovisual content in the European Union. It focuses on enhancing the competitiveness of the European audiovisual sector by fostering the creation of high-quality projects that can attract audiences both in Europe and globally. The initiative encourages collaboration among creators, producers, and distributors to develop projects that reflect European values and cultural diversity.

title: HORIZON-CL4-2025-03-DIGITAL-EMERGING-02
abstract: This call aims to support the development of advanced digital technologies and their applications in various sectors. It focuses on fostering innovation, enhancing competitiveness, and addressing societal challenges through digital transformation. Projects should demonstrate clear pathways to market and societal impact, leveraging cutting-edge research and collaboration among stakeholders.

title: HORIZON-JU-EUROHPC-2026-COE-LH-01-03
abstract: This call aims to support the establishment of Centres of Excellence (CoEs) in the field of High Performance Computing (HPC) and Quantum Computing. The CoEs will provide expertise and support to users in academia and industry, facilitating the adoption of HPC and Quantum Computing technologies. The focus will be on developing innovative applications and solutions that leverage these advanced computing capabilities to address societal challenges and enhance European competitiveness.

title: EU Funding & Tenders Portal

title: HORIZON-CL6-2025-01-CIRCBIO-01-two-stage
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation projects that address the challenges of circular bioeconomy. It focuses on developing sustainable solutions for the production and use of biomass, promoting the efficient use of resources, and enhancing the resilience of ecosystems. Projects should demonstrate innovative approaches to bio-based products and processes, contributing to the EU's climate goals and fostering economic growth.

title: ED-2025-IRELAND-FPA
abstract: The Funding and Tenders Portal is the single entry point (the Single Electronic Data Interchange Area) for applicants, contractors and experts in funding programmes and procurements managed by the European Commission.

title: HORIZON-CL6-2025-02-FARM2FORK-17
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation projects that contribute to the Farm to Fork Strategy, focusing on sustainable food systems, food security, and nutrition. It encourages interdisciplinary approaches and collaboration among stakeholders to address challenges in the agri-food sector, promoting sustainable practices and innovative solutions.

title: HORIZON-CL6-2025-01-CIRCBIO-11
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation in the field of circular bioeconomy. It focuses on developing sustainable solutions that enhance the use of biological resources while minimizing waste and environmental impact. Projects should address challenges related to biomass production, processing, and utilization, fostering collaboration among stakeholders to create a more circular economy.

title: HORIZON-CL2-2025-01-HERITAGE-03
abstract: This call aims to support projects that enhance the understanding and preservation of cultural heritage. It encourages innovative approaches to heritage management, including the use of digital technologies and community engagement. Projects should address the challenges faced by cultural heritage in the context of climate change, urbanization, and social inclusion. The expected outcomes include increased public awareness and improved policies for heritage protection.

title: HORIZON-CL6-2025-02-COMMUNITIES-02
abstract: This call aims to support projects that foster community engagement and social innovation across Europe. It encourages collaboration among various stakeholders, including local authorities, NGOs, and citizens, to address societal challenges. The focus is on creating sustainable solutions that enhance community resilience and well-being, while promoting inclusivity and participation in decision-making processes.

title: HORIZON-CL6-2025-01-BIODIV-08
abstract: This call aims to support research and innovation actions that contribute to the conservation and sustainable use of biodiversity and ecosystems. It focuses on the development of innovative solutions and approaches to address biodiversity loss, enhance ecosystem services, and promote nature-based solutions. The call encourages interdisciplinary collaboration and aims to foster synergies between different sectors and stakeholders.

title: DIGITAL-JU-EUROHPC-2025-NCC-01-02
abstract: This call aims to support the establishment of a National Competence Centre (NCC) in the field of High Performance Computing (HPC) and Quantum Computing (QC) in the EU. The NCC will facilitate the uptake of HPC and QC technologies across various sectors, enhancing the digital transformation of the economy and society. It will also promote collaboration between academia, industry, and public administrations to foster innovation and research in these critical areas.
